citeinfo.origin: Environmental Systems Research Institute (ESRI), National Biological Information Infrastructure (NBII), Southern Appalachian Information Node (SAIN) Geographic Information Systems (GIS) group (ed.)
citeinfo.title: SAVEM - Major Roads - Clinch River Watershed

descript.abstract: Major roads within Clinch watershed. Includes name, locations, FIPS code of state, length, and FCC of interstates, highways, and other major thoroughfares.
descript.purpose:
Provides road locations to aid the visualization of water chemistry sample site locations within the Clinch River watershed project area. Originally produced for the Southern Appalachian Man and the Biosphere (SAMAB) 2002 Fall Conference by the National Biological Information Infrastructure (NBII) Southern Appalachian Information Node (SAIN) for the SAMAB Southern Appalachian Volunteer Environmental Monitoring
(SAVEM) program.
descript.supplinf: Largest scale when displaying the data: 1:50,000. (previous geoform was 'vector digital data'). PJ Nabors, Biogeographer, was the original access point of contact and metadata author.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcCatalog 8.3.0.800

dataqual.logic: No duplicate features are present. The shapefile is exported using Avenue request ExportClean. This request verifies and enforces the correctness of shapes.
dataqual.complete: After processing, the data set is checked for drawing display and number of records and file sizes compared with source materials.

horizpa.horizpar:
The geospatial part of this data set was extracted from the 1990 Census Version TIGER/LineÂ® files (CDâ€“ROM edition). To improve the accuracy, GDT ran a process against the entire nationwide database. The positional accuracy of this data set exceeds the positional accuracy of the TIGER/Line coordinates.
The positional accuracy of the TIGER/Line coordinates varies with the source materials used but at best meets the established National Map Accuracy standards (+/- 167 feet approximately) where 1:100,000-scale maps from the USGS are the source. The Census Bureau cannot specify the accuracy of feature updates added by its field staff or of features derived from the GBF/DIME-Files or other map sources. Thus, the level of positional accuracy in the TIGER/Line files is not suitable for high-precision measurement applications such as engineering problems, property transfers, or other uses that might require highly accurate measurements of the earthâ€™â„¢s surface.

citeinfo.origin: Geographic Data Technology, Inc. (GDT),Environmental Systems Research Institute, Inc. (ESRI)
citeinfo.title: SAVEM - Major Roads - U.S. Major Roads

procstep.procdesc: Clipped from mjrroads.shp from ESRIâ€™â„¢s 2002 Data and Maps CD set using clinch-hucbounds.shp as clip layer.

enttyp.enttypd: The lines represent the interstates, highways, and other major thoroughfares within United States. Confined to Clinch River Watershed.

attr.attrdef: The alternate name of the road.
The Feature Classification Code of the road.

codesetd.codesetn: Census Feature Classification Codes (also called " FCC" )

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: The primary name of the road.
The length of the road segment in miles based on Albers Equal Area Projection.
The FIPS code (two-digit number) for the state in which the road segment is located.
attr.attrdefs: Department of Commerce, National Institute of Standards and Technology

codesetd.codesets: National Institute of Standards and Technology

This disclaimer applies both to individual use of the data and aggregate use with other data. It is strongly recommended that these data are directly acquired from a National Biological Information Infrastructure server, and not indirectly through other sources which may have changed the data in some way. It is also strongly recommended that careful attention be paid to the contents of the metadata file associated with these data. NBII shall not be held liable for improper or incorrect use of the data described and/or contained herein.
